Setting Locking Options

To perform this procedure, you must first select the project database or project you want to configure. The project database or project must also be associated with a configuration file.

To set locking options:

  1. Select Admin | Configure Project. The Configure Project dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. If not already selected, select the Show Advanced Options check box.

  3. Select Locking beneath Archives. The Archive Locking pane on the right appears. The values that display for each option are the settings that are currently defined in the configuration file associated with the project database or project.

  4. To set the options, do any of the following:

    • Select either One or More Than One for the locks allowed on each revision.
    • Select either One or More Than One for the locks allowed by each user.
    • Select the Remove lock on unchanged revision check box to unlock unchanged revisions during checkin without incrementing the revision number. If this option is deselected, Version Manager cancels the checkin of unchanged revisions and leaves them locked.


  5. Click OK if you are finished defining options, or click Apply to save the settings and continue to define other options.
